jobs.title: Research Analyst
jobs.description:
Due to rapid growth and demand, we are expanding our research analyst team and looking for an exceptional Italian speaking analyst to join us. The successful researcher will be able to analyse autonomously data, trends, strategies and present finding.


Responsibilities:
- Collect data on consumers, competitors and market place and consolidate information into actionable items, reports and presentations
- Interpret data, formulate reports m and make recommendations
- Use online market research and catalogue
- Provide competitive analysis on various companies’ market offerings, identify market trends, pricing/business models, sales and methods of operation
- Evaluate project methodology and key data to ensure that data on the releases are accurate and the angle of the release is correct
- Remain fully informed on market trends, other parties researches and implement best practices
- Product & Client Research
- Client enhancement and management
- Daily bulletin reports
- Adhoc analysis
- Presentation of market & product insight
Reports generation Excel and Power point


Requirements:
- Up to 4 years of experience in research & analytics
- Knowledge of the Italia Telecom Market would be of advantage
- Analytical skills and problem-solving capabilities
- Fluent speaking Italian
- Excellent writing skills
- Great interpersonal and client-management skills
- Ability to manage your time to produce high-quality work to deadlines
- Advance Excel and Power Point ability

jobs.title: Reporting Development
jobs.description:
This role supports the business by providing readily accessible, accurate and relevant information upon which decisions can be taken with confidence. Its aim is to source all pertinent datasets and enrich the data so that reporting outputs can be produced in accordance to the diverse needs of the business.

Summary of role priorities:

Lead the development of all Extract, Transform and Load (ETL) projects on new data-sets
Lead the development of data enrichment of new and existing data-sets
Lead the development of automated self-serve reporting
Ensure the governance of data and quality is adhered to
Lead and simplify reference data management processors
Support Ad-ho data and reporting requests

Experience:

Experience of working with large data-sets
Knowledge of Azure SQL Databases
SQL Server, big data appliance experience.
Strong analytical / reporting background
Strong written, verbal & presentation skills
Advanced working knowledge of Access skills
Intermediate /Advanced working knowledge of Excel
Intermediate /Advanced working knowledge of PowerPoint skills
API integration knowledge (desirable)
Personal Skills

Motivated self-starter:

Time management and prioritisation skills.
A passion for creating solutions with a positive attitude to change.
Highly inquisitive.
Data driven.
Excellent communication skills and ability to work well in a team.
